text:
Hello,
Is it doable to let enrolled contacts/deals have 50 50 probability to go on 2 branches.

Let's say i enrolled contacts to receive 2 different sms version.(Each of these sms have a meeting link with a different sales person).

Is there a way to set enrolled contact to go on the 2 branches randomly ? so that not all contacts would receive an sms to book a call with the same sales person.

Thanks !
